name: Odo Garden Jelly Match3
description:
Odo Garden Jelly Match3 is fun match 3 casual puzzle! Objectives differ in over 200 levels. Make matches of 3 or more Jelly, create blasts! Starts out simple, but things get more and more interesting and challenging. Start your sweet journey in this puzzle adventure!
HOW TO PLAY
• Swap and Match 3 or more candies of the same!
• Complete the level!
• Remove the candies as much as you can!
• To get a special candy!
